## Overview

The Burden of Disease section quantifies the **health impact** of notifiable conditions beyond simple case counts. Three complementary indicators are computed:

| Indicator | Meaning |
|---|---|
| **YLL** (Years of Life Lost) | Premature mortality impact, computed from SA life tables and vital registration data |
| **DALYs** (Disability-Adjusted Life Years) | Combined mortality (YLL) + morbidity (YLD) burden |
| **ASR** (Age-Standardised Rates) | Rates adjusted for population age structure to enable fair comparisons across provinces |

::: {.callout-important}
## Methodological Note
All estimates depend on data quality and completeness. Assumptions, disability weights, and life table sources are documented on the [Methods](../methods.html) page.
:::
